findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to a Denial of Service (DoS) attack due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions lock() and unlock() uses a loop to iterate through _ids list and will be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long list. The function addPairs() also uses a loop to add pairs from the list and will be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long list.

findings.title: Lock() function ignores return value by EnumerableSetUpgradeable.add()
findings.description: The Lock() function does not check the return value of the add() method from EnumerableSetUpgradeable.

findings.title: Unlock() function ignores return value by EnumerableSetUpgradeable.remove()
findings.description: The Unlock() function does not check the return value of EnumerableSetUpgradeable.remove(), which may lead to unexpected behavior.
